project.name: C-C412A-SUBV-06-ST01-DT06-DF11-CF19-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C412A-SUBV-06-ST01-DT06-DF11-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository During preprocessing, files are created and placed in a directory to represent a lock that is externally accessible and unrestricted The program itself reads an input string. It will attempt to create a lock by creating a file in the testData directory named <input string>.lck. If such a file does not exist, it will run to completion. If such a file does exists, it will wait until it is deleted so that it can create its own file. This results in a deadlock. testData directory. Bad inputs: name of a file that does exist under the testData directory.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C412A-SUBV-06-ST01-DT06-DF11-CF19-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file During preprocessing, files are created and placed in a directory to represent a lock that is externally accessible and unrestricted The program itself reads an input string. It will attempt to create a lock by creating a file in the testData directory named <input string>.lck. If such a file does not exist, it will run to completion. If such a file does exists, it will wait until it is deleted so that it can create its own file. This results in a deadlock. testData directory. Bad inputs: name of a file that does exist under the testData directory.

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
